
## Invert Elevation

```{r invert-elevation, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
ie1 = read_ie(file1, type1)
ie2 = read_ie(file2, type2)
ie.diff = diff_ie(ie1, ie2)
ie.rmse.station = rmse_ie(ie.diff, "Station")
ie.rmse.time = rmse_ie(ie.diff, "Time")

ie.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_ie) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Invert Elevation Differences at Stations")
ie.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_ie) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Invert Elevation RMSE at Stations")
ie.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_ie) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Invert Elevation RMSE Through Time")
```
